content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: acacia_boat
inventory=[{"type": "iron_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 31, "index": 11}, {"type": "birch_sign", "quantity": 6, "index": 13}, {"type": "flower_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 43, "index": 18}, {"type": "spruce_sapling", "quantity": 33, "index": 25}, {"type": "acacia_log", "quantity": 2, "index": 27}, {"type": "salmon_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_button", "quantity": 46, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft an acacia_boat, I need to craft 2 acacia_planks. To craft the acacia_planks, I need to move the acacia_log from slot 27 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 27 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: acacia_boat
inventory=[{"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "acacia_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "iron_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 31, "index": 11}, {"type": "birch_sign", "quantity": 6, "index": 13}, {"type": "flower_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 43, "index": 18}, {"type": "spruce_sapling", "quantity": 33, "index": 25}, {"type": "acacia_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "salmon_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_button", "quantity": 46, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that the acacia_planks have been crafted, I will move them to an empty inventory slot (eg., 12). I will need to craft more acacia_planks, so I will move 4 of them to an inventory slot.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4
